synopsis: Yumi and Sachiko head out to the Ogasawara family's summer home, but what was supposed to be a relaxing vacation takes a turn for the worse when some of Sachiko's old acquaintances drop by for tea.

Wanting to help Sachiko overcome her hatred of men, Yumi arranges a meeting with the Hanadera student council. After all, both Lillian and Hanadera have to work together on their school festivals so it would be a good idea, right?
Yumi has a stalker - Kanako Hosokawa! Kanako seems to think that Yumi is the perfect Lillian girl, but she's got a few things to learn about the real Yumi.
In hopes of making up with Kanako, Yumi makes a bet over the outcome of the Athletic Festival.
Yumi, Yoshino, and Shimako, head off to Italy on a school field trip. It's an experience they'll never forget.
